nodes.text: Mindra Nox was a female Corellian entrepreneur. In 1 ABY, she had trouble with a rogue Corellian slicer who called himself Emmin Whitehat. When she finally found out where he lived, Nox hired a spacer to take him out. Although Whitehat intercepted the message, he was unable to prevent the spacer from fulfilling his mission.
Nox is the quest giver of a mission called "Criminal Slicer Emmin Whitehat" in Star Wars Galaxies that players can get at Mission Terminals on Corellia.
